description: Barak, Ehud, 1942- -- Photographs; Beilin, Yossi -- Photographs
label: Prime Minister Yitzhak Rabin enlarged his cabinet on Tuesday when he brought in the army's former Chief of General Staff Ehud Barak and former Deputy Foreign Minister Yossi Beilin.
